def main():
    # Get input
    x = int(input())
    a = int(input())
    b = int(input())
    # Calculate
    remainder = x - a
    remainder = remainder - (remainder // b) * b 
    # Print
    print(remainder)


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

print(int(input()) - int(input()) - (int(input()) * (int(input()) - int(input())) // int(input())))


x = int(input())
a = int(input())
b = int(input())

print(x - a - ((x - a) // b) * b)


x = int(input())
a = int(input())
b = int(input())
c = x - a - (b * (x - a) // b)
print(c)

#!/usr/bin/env python3


def main():
    # Get input
    x = int(input())
    a = int(input())
    b = int(input())
    # Calculate
    remainder = x - a
    remainder = remainder - (remainder // b) * b
    # Print
    print(remainder)


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

def main():
    # Get input
    x = int(input())
    a = int(input())
    b = int(input())
    # Calculate
    remainder = x - a
    remainder = remainder - (remainder // b)*b
    # Print
    print(remainder)


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()



def main():
    # Get input
    x = int(input())
    a = int(input())
    b = int(input())
    # Calculate
    remainder = x - a - (x - a) // b * b
    # Print
    print(remainder)


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
